thread.title: George Georgakakis

author: George Georgakakis
title: George Georgakakis
text: From the beginning,this company gave me more money than the others ,they kept their word and gave me extras like $10 bonus and even more when I drew something on the outside of the box. Also they mailed me the shipping box as well.everything was perfect,for some people that don't read the instructions,like peeling off the prescription stickers,we sometimes damage the little boxes,so I just left it on,and all was well. Again thank you for your services and thanks for being on time on point!!!!Boston GeorgeðŸ˜Ž
